articles.title: Jaipur man purchases Ather 450 electric scooter with Rs 10 coins, CEO reacts - Times of India
articles.description: Electric Bike News: In an unexpected turn of events, a customer from Jaipur purchased a new Ather 450 electric scooter using nothing but Rs 10 coins. This unique payment method grabbed the attention of Ather Energy's CEO, Tarun Mehta.
